flawed_nl_solution:
The width of his garden is going to be 1000 / 8 = <<1000/8=152>>152 feet.
The length of his garden is going to be 2250 / 10 = <<2250/10=225>>225 feet.
So the area of his garden is going to be 152 X 225 = 34200 square feet.
#### 34200

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 125, not 152. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
